head.citation-title: 2012 IEEE Conference on Technologies for Practical Robot Applications, TePRA 2012
head.abstracts: The proceedings contain 30 papers. The topics discussed include: analyzing solution quality of anytime bag of words object classification for a service robot; estimation of attitude via quaternion in an industrial robot; control and navigation of a three wheeled unmanned ground vehicle by L1 adaptive control architecture; analyzing and modeling an IMU for use in a low-cost combined vision and inertial navigation system; guiding robots through wireless location positioning; robot control system with integrated vision/force feedback for automated sorting system; next generation image guided citrus fruit picker; a new color contrast enhancement algorithm for robotic applications; graphical microcontroller programming; accessible aerial autonomy; educational robotics for teleoperated general exam; BOR3D: a use-case-oriented software framework for 3-D object recognition; and UAV obstacle avoidance using image processing techniques.

source.sourcetitle-abbrev: IEEE Conf. Technol. Pract. Rob. Appl., TePRA
